findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Owner Privilege Persistence
findings.description: The owner can lock and unlock, allowing them to retain ownership even after renouncing it.

findings.title: Out of gas exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.
findings.description: The function includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply, respectively. If the excluded addresses list is too long, it may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception.
